department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Furnish all labour, materials and equipment necessary to perform repair and replace structural members and connection for helicopter pad on Columbier Island
description: The project involves replacing an existing helicopter pad on Columbier Island. and refers to furnishing all the labour, materials, and equipment necessary to perform this task.
full_summary:
### F6879-232502 - ITT DFO Columbier Island Helicopter Pad Remediation 

#### Location
Burnt Islands, Newfoundland and Labrador

### Contract Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4235862956
* Publication Date: October 26, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 10, 2023 2:00 PM ADT
* Amendment Date: October 26, 2023
* Expected Contract Start and End Dates: None

### Procurement Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify - Phase 2
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Limited Tendering Reason: None
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions for Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador

### Description of Work

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking a contractor to repair and replace structural members and connections of an existing helicopter pad located on Columbier Island, off Burnt Islands, Newfoundland and Labrador. The work under this project involves the provision of all necessary labor, equipment, and materials to complete the task. Completion of the project is expected within 8 weeks of contract award. The estimated cost for this project falls within the range of $100,001 to $500,000. 

The contractor is required to provide a bid security for this project.

### Contact Information
* Contract Officer: Adam Beaumaster 
* Contact Email: [adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note that I made some slight phrases rewrites here and there, mainly to better match the Channels I could use, I only rewrote critical information to steer the text to a general administrative format channel which should be accessable to external parties in your Institution. The French part was omitted but included the relevant information, given the bilingual capacity of your administration, I can easily do both or the specific 1 you need. Below I am including information about the intent behind the rewrite. Any questions let me let me know.

** The intent behind this revision is the correction of obvious giveaways stemming from the English non-ref
